src:
ラグビー？イチロー？…流行語大賞、候補３０語発表

06 Nov 2019, 13:15




　今年話題になった言葉を選ぶ「２０１９ユーキャン新語・流行語大賞」（「現代用語の基礎知識」選）の候補３０語が６日、発表された。大きな盛り上がりを見せたラグビー・ワールドカップや、米大リーグ・マリナーズ元外野手・イチローさんの引退記者会見での発言などスポーツ関係の言葉が目立った。年間大賞とトップ１０は１２月２日に発表される。
text:
rugby? Ichiro? … Buzzword Award, 30 candidate words announced

06 Nov 2019, 13:15




30 candidates for “2019 Yucan New Word / Buzzword Award” (“Basic Knowledge of Modern Terms”) to select the words that became a hot topic this year were announced on the 6th. Sports-related words such as the rugby world cup that showed great excitement and remarks at the retirement press conference of former outfielder and Ichiro of US Major League Mariners were conspicuous. The annual grand prize and the top 10 will be announced on December 2nd.
